title: FxPHD - AUD101 - Introduction to Digital Audio Post - sum1_here
description: Designed with the graphic artist, effects artist and editor in mind, this course will provide a solid foundation of knowledge of production and post production audio. Taught by audio mixer/designer Cory Coken, the course will center on four core areas of audio: dialogue, sound effects, music, and mix. The course will be a series of on camera classes covering techniques and approaches.
